sentences: Lars Danielsson (born 5 September 1958) is a Swedish jazz bassist, composer, and record producer.
Danielsson was born in Sm√•landsstenar, and was educated at the music conservatory in Gothenburg.
In 1985, he formed a quartet with saxophonist Dave Liebman, pianist Bobo Stenson and drummer Jon Christensen that sometimes used Danielsson's name, producing several albums.
